page.title: 13 The Railway (Shipton)
page.content: This railway is a very important railway it is the{main line}railway from{London to Aberdeen}which is 858 kilometres long.There are 2 tracks going each way the outer tracks are for the slower trains the max.speed reached is 90mph the inner tracks are for the faster trains the max.speed is 160mph.It is not 4 tracks all the way from London to Aberdeen,from London to Welwyn Viaduct is 4 tracks and from York to Northallerton is 4 tracks then most of it is 2 tracks and some other short sections are 4 tracks.Inter-city 125,Deltics and DMU go on the line.The freight trains carry things like petrol,coal,cars,steel,cement,parcels, mail,trucks and various chemicals. There was once a station at Shipton but it was closed about 1962.
